short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Guard your focus! FocusGuardian helps you block distracting sites so you can remain concentrated on what matters most.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FocusGuardian - Guard Your Productivity! üõ°Ô∏è
Tired of social networks and endless distractions eating away at your productivity? We've got your back! FocusGuardian is your trusted ally in the digital realm, ensuring you stay on task, one blocked distraction at a time.

Key Features üöÄ
Block Distracting Sites: Prevent unintentional time-wasting by adding websites to your personalized blocklist.

Personalized Focus by Weekdays and Time Ranges: Fine-tune your focus by blocking sites on specific days and times that you set.

Multilingual Support: The extension is available in English, Russian, Turkish, and Hindi.

Secure: Your privacy matters. FocusGuardian doesn't collect or share your personal data.

How It Works üñ±Ô∏è
Initial Setup: Click on the FocusGuardian icon in your Chrome toolbar to set up your preferred language.

Adding Sites to Blocklist: Easily add distracting sites to your blocklist with just one click.

Configuring Time-Based Blocks: Set specific days and times to block certain sites.

Motivational Quotes: Get inspired with quotes that remind you of your goals whenever you try to visit a blocked site.

üîí Your Privacy Matters
At FocusGuardian, we respect your privacy. The extension operates entirely on your device. We do not store, share, or transmit any of your browsing data or personal information. Our primary goal is to help you stay focused; your privacy remains intact.

üåê Open Source
FocusGuardian is proud to be an open-source project! This means complete transparency, and you're always welcome to peek under the hood, suggest improvements, or even contribute. We believe in a community-driven approach to making the web a more productive space for everyone. You can visit repository https://github.com/Romander/FocusGuardian

So, why wait? Install FocusGuardian and take the first step towards a more focused and productive digital life. Because your time matters, and we're here to help you make the most of it.
